title: So nobody will comment how Riot Meddler actually confirmed that ADCs are assassins?
body:
Meddler plans to give compensation buffs to Miss Fortune and Quin for Duskblade nerfs. Meanwhile half AD assassins that depend on it wont get any, and some that have been running rampant will. Totally not an adc-main opinion. 
He might have as well written.
ADC=Assasin confirmed. 

We'll be moving the Duskblade nerfs back to 8.6 so that we've got enough time to also do some compensatory work on champions who might be hit too hard otherwise. Not sure exactly what that compensation will look like yet. Possible (not guaranteed) candidates for buffs below. Most likely case where we don't buff is if a champion already has similar strength with Ghostblade or something else (they're not actually very dependent on Duskblade).:
Wukong
Zed
Talon
Rengar
Quinn
Miss Fortune
Kayn
Kha'Zix


Now lets analyze this: Shaco,Jarvan, Nocturne,  and others wont be getting any compensation buffs even though they are assassins and all use Duskblade, yet we have Miss Fortune and Quin get one. Even though they have I.E. and Statik Shiv/Essence reaver to produce similar or better results.
